author: CBS Boston
title: Snow Totals – February 9 Storm
text:
WINTER STORM WARNING: Until 8 pm | Forecast | Blog | Radar | Weather App | Closings-Delays Snow Totals – February 9 Storm February 9, 2017 12:39 PM Filed Under: Snow , Snow Totals (Photo credit: Allan Seymour) 
BOSTON (CBS) – A major nor’easter is bearing down on southern New England and is expected to dump more than a foot of snow for parts of the region. 
Here are the latest snowfall totals from the National Weather Service in Boston, Rob Macedo, the SKYWARN Coordinator for the National Weather Service in Taunton, and WBZ-TV Weather Watchers . Westfield
